bike.description: Double butted Reynolds 520 Cr-Mo,  singlespeed specific, integrated head set, MID BB shell, hydra-formed chainstays, 3D forged horizontal drop outs w/ intl std disc mount

components.description: Custom Rockshox Argyle R 26", Solo Air spring, alloy 1-1/8" steerer, 32mm alloy stanchions and mag lowers,  20mm Maxle® thru axle, external rebound adj., 80mm travel
Integrated 1-1/8" threadless, Campy-style, full cartridge bearings
Specialized P.Series MTB, forged alloy, top load, 40mm length, 31.8mm
Specialized P.Series MTB Street, heat-treated butted Cr-Mo, 720mm wide, 11º backsweep, 2º upsweep, 75mm rise
Specialized P.Grip, flanged soft compound, end plugs, 150mm
Avid Elixir 1, hydraulic disc, G2 Cleansweep 140mm rotor
Avid Elixir 1, hydraulic lever
Singlespeed, Cr-Mo, 12t
KMC Z-510H, 1/2" x 1/8", anti-drop inner links
3pc. tubular heat treated Cr-Mo, 48-spline, 175mm
25t, Cr-Mo, for 48-spline
MID BB, 2x sealed cartridge bearing w/ 19mm, 48-spline Cr-Mo spindle, alloy tube and cone spacers
Specialized P.Series NYLON platform w/ molded pins, loose ball, 9/16"
Specialized P.Series, 26", alloy double-wall, triple void, 32mm, pin joint, 36h
Specialized P.Series MTB alloy, 20mm thru axle, sealed cartridge bearings, 36h
Specialized P.Series Dirt, alloy, cartridge bearings, 36h
Stainless, 2.0mm (14g)
Specialized Rhythm Lite, 26x2.3", kevlar bead, 60TPI
Specialized Compound Control, 26x2.2", kevlar bead, 60TPI
Schraeder valve
Specialized P.Series 1pc co-molded composite saddle & alloy 25.4mm seat post combination w/ debossed "P. Series" logo padded cover
Alloy, no offset, 25.4mm, integrated w/ saddle
Integrated Cr-Mo bolt and nylock nut
Chain stay protector, reflectors, owners manual
